MajorClaims.Text: the advanced medical care brings with it more benefits than disadvantages
the development of the health care system helps people have a better life

Claims.Text: the increase in life expectancy has some pressure on the Medicare system
the improvement of medical care makes a better life for all people
The main advantage of high-tech medical care is that people are better taken care so that they have a good health
the increase in life expectancy puts a high pressure on the economic system
It helps people build a sustainable society where people can live a happy life when they are old

Premises.Text: They can contribute effectively to the development of the economy
healthy workers can create more productivity
they do not have to spend more time in health checking or treatment
this saves an amount of time as well as cost
a community with the elderly who have a good health has a major role to play in a sustainable development of a society
young people will be happy as their parents, grandparents are healthy
more pension have to spend for Medicare instead of investing in other sectors of the economic system
the capital that spend on taking care the elderly is contributed by these people during their working time
they are worth to have good care
They have given their effort to the society so that young people, the governments have a responsibility to improve the Medicare system
